name: High school fantasy
detailed_description:
High school fantasy is a short Visual Novel.

In High school fantasy, follow the story of Jack, just your average high school guy. Dan is a 19-year-old guy in his last year of high school. He has only girls on his mind.

Plot

You go to school with a lot of hot girls. You are single and you want a girlfriend badly! That is your mission for the day. Will you be able to accomplish it? You make the choices, so your destiny is in your hands.

Features

  • lounge background music
  • multiple endings
  • hot girls
  • realistic backgrounds

short_description: In High school fantasy, follow the story of Dan, just your average high school guy. Dan is a 19-year-old guy in his last year of high school. He lives with two hot stepsisters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages and not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, Sexual Depictions
